REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F A RM f1598 reute u f BC-/U.S.-TRUST-CO-<USTC> 04-13 0048

TEXT.TITLE: U.S. TRUST CO <USTC> RAISES BROKER LOAN RATE
TEXT.BODY: U.S. Trust Co said it raised its broker loan rate to 7-3/4 pct from 7-1/2 pct, effective immediately. Bankers Trust Co <BT>, which also quotes its broker loan rate publicly, raised its rate to 7-1/2 pct earlier today. Reuter
